title: Hey kido, this is what I want you to know about our planet
description: Scientists inferred that 13.7 billion years ago, all the matter in the Universe was concentrated into a tiny point. BOOM! The Universe exploded and begin expanding. About 4.6 billion years ago, the Solar System formed and since became home to the sun, and eight planets: Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune.
